Package equipments.Lamp

package equipments.Lamp

Lamp component for the Household Energy Management project.

Licence

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to provide a basic household management systems as an example of a cyber-physical system.

The fact that you are presently reading this means that you have had knowledge of the CeCILL-C license and that you accept its terms.

This package defines a thermostated heater component used in the Household Energy Management project.

    Package
    Description
    equipments.Lamp.mil
    MIL simulation models of the hair dryer.
  • Class
    Description
    CVMUnitTest
    The class CVMUnitTest performs unit tests on the Lamp component.
    Lamp
    The class Lamp implements the cooking plate component.
    LampConnector
    The class LampConnector implements a connector for the LampUserCI component interface.
    LampImplementationI
    The interface LampImplementationI defines the signatures of services service implemented by the lamp component.
    LampImplementationI.LampMode
    The enumeration LampMode describes the operation modes of the lamp.
    LampImplementationI.LampState
    The enumeration LampState describes the operation states of the lamp.
    LampInboundPort
    The class lampInboundPort implements an inbound port for the lampUserCI component interface.
    LampOperationI
    The interface LampOperationI declares operations that simulation models must implement to have events associated with the models execute on them.
    LampOutboundPort
    The class LampOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the LampUserCI component interface.
    LampTester
    The class LampTester implements a component performing tests for the class Lamp as a BCM component.
    LampUser
    The class LampTester implements a component performing tests for the class Lamp as a BCM component.
    LampUserCI
    The component interface LampUserCI defines the services a cooking plate component offers and that can be required from it.
